text: Miguel-Ángel Cárdenas (October 3, 1934 – June 2, 2015), also known as Michel Cardena, was a Colombian-Dutch, New Realism and Pop Art painter. He was known for his video art in the Netherlands. His works covered many artistic media, including painting, drawing, video, photography, object assemblages and digital art. He was born in Espinal, Tolima, Colombia. ==Other websites== * Miguel-Ángel Cárdenas official website * Collection of video works by Miguel- Ángel Cárdenas Category:1934 births Category:2015 deaths Category:Colombian artists Category:Dutch painters
title: Miguel-Ángel Cárdenas
